keyword: calories in an auntie annes pretzel
title: Calories in an Auntie Anne's Pretzel
meta_description: Discover calories in an Auntie Anne's pretzel, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and variations for better choices.
h1: Calories in an Auntie Anne's Pretzel
assumptions: Standard original soft pretzel (about 115 g), fresh-baked, salted topping, no dips or add-ons.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, size, and customizations. Check Auntie Anne's app or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Auntie Anne's pretzel has about 280 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Bite-sized minis (10 pieces equivalent to 1 full)

faqs.q: How many calories in an Auntie Anne's pretzel?
faqs.a: Approximately 280 kcal for one standard original pretzel.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in an Auntie Anne's pretzel?
faqs.a: About 51 g carbs, including 2 g fiber and 10 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Auntie Anne's pretzels?
faqs.a: Yes, around 700 mg per pretzel due to the salted topping.

faqs.q: How much protein in one Auntie Anne's pretzel?
Do Auntie Anne's pretzels have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in the standard pretzel.
